strings.Value: "Relax, friend. Let's just drink a little and talk."
"We wanted to have a picnic for a long time. Join us!"
"Forgive me, Your Grace, but where is Ekundayo?"
"Without him, we can't start our feast. We need to get him here."
"Ekun, old friend! Speak of the devil!"
{n}Ekun's face freezes in surprise. He stares at Ntavi and Elina silently for a few moments, completely still.{/n}
{n}Finally, Ekun turns a quizzical look to you.{/n}
{n}Grabbing Ekun's arm, Elina leads him to the tables with food.{/n} "Please come here, Ekundayo... you don't mind if I call you Ekun?"

{n}{d|Ntavi}Ntavi{/d} fixes her hair and you notice a tattoo of a stinging wasp on her wrist. Following the couple with a long stare, Ntavi says quietly to you,{/n} "Please come to me when everyone is busy eating and drinking. I would like to talk to you."
